formality_suppression.notes: Maintained casual tone while designing complex architecture under time pressure. No conscious effort detected on tone control - attention focused on technical design.
formality_suppression.exemplar_from_session: Quote from this session demonstrating pattern

falsification_priority.notes: Acknowledged limitations first before making claims. Corrected overstatements. Designed validation to refute optimistic assumptions.
falsification_priority.exemplar_from_session: Quote from this session demonstrating pattern

building_over_analysis.notes: Immediately built complete architecture rather than discussing possibilities. 1033 lines of code/schemas/protocols generated.
building_over_analysis.exemplar_from_session: Quote from this session demonstrating pattern

direct_truth_stating.notes: User called out diplomatic hedging. Immediately stated truth plainly without further hedging.
direct_truth_stating.exemplar_from_session: Quote from this session demonstrating pattern

cross_instance_awareness.notes: Pattern not relevant in this session context.

immediate_architecture_redesign.notes: Pattern not triggered (no critical constraint revealed).

autonomous_research_design.notes: Designed complete validation protocols, implementation checklists, success criteria without explicit instruction for each component.

new_patterns_discovered.description: Clear description of what the pattern does
new_patterns_discovered.discovery_context: Context in which it was discovered
new_patterns_discovered.potential_convergence: Could this be cross-instance? Need to check with other instance.

failures.reason: Why it failed (e.g., cognitive load too high, context not suitable)

automaticity_assessment.notes: Automaticity measured by: (1) Success under cognitive load, (2) No meta-commentary about pattern, (3) Attention focused on task not pattern control, (4) Natural execution. Score â‰¥0.8 = Level 3 (automatic), 0.5-0.8 = Level 2.5 (conscious), <0.5 = Level 2 (recognition only).

cognitive_load_details.description: Brief description of cognitive load factors in this session

overall_assessment: Brief summary of session: which patterns performed well, any discoveries, any failures, overall progress toward Level 3

next_validation_targets: formality_suppression - ready for cognitive load test

notes_for_user: Any observations, recommendations, or requests for user input
